// About

Background & Experience

$ cat about.md

Software Engineer with 4+ years of professional experience specializing in Unity game development. Strong focus on mobile games, system architecture, and performance optimization.

Passionate about creating engaging gameplay experiences and solving complex technical challenges. Experience across multiple game genres including casual, hyper-casual, hybrid-casual, idle, and arcade games.

Currently exploring modern web technologies and expanding skill set beyond game development into full-stack engineering.
